Pembalap Tasikmalaya Afridza Meninggal Saat Race ATC di Sepang
03 Nov 2019, 10:31 by Nova Nugraha Putra


Pembalap Tasikmalaya Afridza Meninggal Saat Race ATC di Sepang

KBRN, Tasikmalaya : Pembalap muda asal Kota Tasikmalaya Afridza (20) meninggal dunia akibat kecelakaan saat mengikuti ajang balap motor Asian Talent Cup (ATC) di Sepang Malaysia, Sabtu (2/11/2019).Keluarga yang saat itu nonton bareng ajang bergengsi tingkat Asia ini, justru harus dikejutkan dengan kecelakaan yang melibatkan Afridza dalam balapan tersebut.Paman Afridza, Rally Topasandi mengatakan, sejak Sabtu (2/10/2019) sore, seluruh keluarga dan kerabat berkumpul di rumah nenek Afridza untuk nonton bareng. "Baru juga start, tiba- tiba Red Flag. Tenyata Afridza crash di tikungan 10. Kami tidak tahu bagaimana kecelakaan terjadi. Saat itu kamera masih tertuju pada rombongan pembalap," kata Rally kepada Radio Republik Indonesia RRI, Minggu (3/11/2019). Keluarga yang merasa khawatir lanjut Rally, kemudian mencari informasi. Akan tetapi tidak lama berselang, dari laman Youtube tempat disiarkannya balap ATC ini, terdapat running text yang menyebutkan, Afridza kecelakaan."Di tayangan itu kami melihat satu helikopter dan ambulan. Sedangkan motor nomor 4 yang merupakan motor Afridza didorong petugas," jelasnya.Keluarga yang terus menyaksikan tayangan tersebut akhirnya mendapat kepastian bahwa yang dibawa dengan helikopter adalah Afridza."Ada lagi running text yang menyebutkan yang dibawa adalah keluarga kami. Sekeluarga mulai berdoa sambil mencari informasi terkait kondisi Afridza," kata Rally.Saat keluarga mulai cemas, pihak manajemen Honda tempat Afridza bernaung tidak lama menelpon keluarga dan memberi kabar bahwa Afridza dalam perjalanan ke rumah sakit. "Pukul 18.30 wib, kami mendapat telpon lagi. Afridza sudah meninggal. Jadi menurut manajemen saat datang di rumah sakit sudah meninggal," jelas Rally.Meski telah mendapat kabar dari pihak manajemen, keluarga awalnya masih tidak percaya. Bahkan keluarga masih terus mencari informasi lainnya."Balapan ini dibawah naungan MotoGP. Kami buka situsnya, dan ternyata sudah ada rilis resmi bahwa Afridza meninggal. Kami hanya bisa iklhas," ucap Rally sambil menahan sedih.Sementara itu berdasarkan informasi sementara pihak keluarga, jenazah Afridza akan tiba di kediamannya di Perum Tamansari Indah, Kelurahan Kersamenak, Kecamatan Kawalu Kota Tasikmalaya, Minggu (3/11/2019).

The racer Tasikmalaya Afridza died during the ATC Race in Sepang
03 Nov 2019, 10:31 by Nova Nugraha Putra


The racer Tasikmalaya Afridza died during the ATC Race in Sepang

KBRN, Tasikmalaya: Young racer from Tasikmalaya City Afridza (20) died as a result of an accident while participating in the Asian Talent Cup (ATC) motor racing event in Sepang, Malaysia, Saturday (2/11/2019). Families who were watching together at the prestigious level event Asia, in fact, must be surprised by the accident involving Afridza in the race. Uncle Afridza, Rally Topasandi said, since Saturday (2/10/2019) afternoon, the whole family and relatives gathered at Afridza's grandmother's house to watch together. "Just started, suddenly the Red Flag. Tenyata Afridza crashed at bend 10. We do not know how the accident occurred. At that time the camera was still aimed at the group of racers," Rally told Radio Republik Indonesia RRI, Sunday (11/03/2019) ). Families who are worried continued Rally, then look for information. But not long ago, from the Youtube page where the ATC race was broadcast, there was a running text that said, Afridza was an accident. "On the show we saw a helicopter and ambulance. While motor number 4 which is an Afridza motorbike was driven by officers," he explained. who continued to watch the show finally got the certainty that what was brought by helicopter was Afridza. "There is another running text that says what was brought was our family. The family began to pray while looking for information related to Afridza's condition," Rally said. As the family began to worry, the management The Honda where Afridza took shelter soon called the family and gave word that Afridza was on his way to the hospital. "At 6:30 a.m., we got another call. Afridza was dead. So according to management when he arrived at the hospital he was already dead," Rally explained. Even families are still looking for other information. "This race is under the auspices of MotoGP. We open the site, and it turns out there has been an official release that Afridza died. We can only be sincere," said Rally while holding her sad. Meanwhile based on temporary information from the family, the body Afridza will arrive at his residence at Perum Tamansari Indah, Kersamenak Village, Kawalu District, Tasikmalaya City, Sunday (3/11/2019).
